website_summaries.verdict: This single convection oven is a great option when space is limited.
pros: This 30-inch wide convection oven offers all the conveniences of Frigidaire's other convection ovens – even baking technology, a delayed start option, and a built-in temperature probe, and steam cleaning – in a single-oven unit that's perfect for smaller kitchens
cons: The downsides of this model is that there is no microwave and only a single oven

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Support
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning how to use it but looks great and seems to be working well. The thing you should know is that Frigidaire has no technical support...no kidding. I also bought a Frigidaire cooktop from Amazon. Frigidaire refers you to the dealer and unfortunately the seller on Amazon will refer you to Frigidaire. So, you might think twice before purchasing through Amazon...great price but you will not have any product support.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Love this oven!
customer_reviews.text: This oven has all of the features I want or need. It cooks perfectly even every single time. Super easy to use! There are a few extra step for the timed bake, for instance if you want the oven to turn on and then off automatically you'll have to go through several steps to get it set up. But that wasn't enough for me to give it fewer than 5 stars. SUPER easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cooling system
customer_reviews.text: The look is chic and extremely sturdy. While baking it has a fan that actually keeps the environs cool. Very nice feature. Then of course there is the cool down time as well. Very useful especially in small kitchens such as mine.
customer_reviews.author: I. Rate

customer_reviews.title: love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I have had it about 6 months now and its great. very nice looking, solid feeling, works like a champ. Also fit my cabinet perfect. 10 out of 10 would do it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING WRONG
customer_reviews.text: Digital panel came broken! Door opens unevenly! The interior has a dent/scratches ! They really tried hard on sending their worst oven !
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Strange

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice works well
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice works well. Fan noise is OK, if door is left closed cool down fan runs for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Leary

customer_reviews.title: This is a real nice oven and looks great too
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice oven and looks great too. I installed in about an hour, after a little widdling for it to fit in existing hole.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the oven. Easy to order and shipping was great.
customer_reviews.author: HELEN FORRESTER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oven!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research on this oven before deciding on it. I have to agree with all the reviews that this is a great oven for the price point. I have had it for a few months and it works/cooks perfectly and looks even better.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley S Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great convection oven
customer_reviews.text: Love the fast preheat, and the openness of the cavity with the heating coils outside of oven cavity
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer in TX

customer_reviews.title: Good overall.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great looking oven and the quality is really nice. However, it takes a long time to warm up and cool down and the fan is pretty noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Mask maker

product_meta.title: Frigidaire FGEW3065PF FGEW3065PF-Gallery 30" Stainless Steel Electric Single Wall Oven-Convection, 30 inches
product_meta.description: Quick Preheat: Preheat in just a few minutes. True Convection: A third heating element and single convection fan circulate hot air throughout the oven for faster and more even multi-rack baking. Steam Cleaning: A 20-minute light oven cleaning that's chemical-free, odor-free, and fast. Quick Clean: Quickly clean your oven in 2 hours with our quick self-clean cycle. Smudge-Proof Stainless Steel: Resists fingerprints and cleans easily. One-Touch Keep Warm Setting: Just one touch of a button keeps food warm until everything - and everyone - is ready. Effortless Convection: Takes the guesswork out of convection cooking - our oven automatically adjust standard baking temperatures to convection temperatures for consistent results. Built with American Pride: Designed, engineered and assembled in the U. S. A. Power Broil: Added power means you can broil food faster. Add-a-Minute: Easily add a minute to the oven timer in the middle of a cycle without resetting. Express-Select(R) Controls: Easily set cooking temperature or choose one-touch cooking options. Even Baking Technology: Our Even Baking Technology ensures even baking every time. ADA Compliant.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
